# Entity.has method

Returns a boolean indicating if a component is present in the entity.

**Signature:**
```javascript
has<T = any>(component: string): boolean;
```
**Returns:** `boolean`

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  `component` | `string` | component class, instance or name |
